subject: VPD TOOL : Fix Broken ECC
commitMessage:
VPD TOOL : Fix Broken ECC

Vpd tool has an added option for fixing the broken ECC,
given the object path and the record for which the ecc
needs to be fixed.

The api assumes the record data is correct and fixes the ECC
accordingly.

Input: Expects the object path & the record where the ecc fails.
Output: Fixes the ecc and writes back the corrected file in EEPROM.

Test:
Tested in simics
Modify/update the vpd at a certain record and run eccFix Tool option.
The ecc of the record is updated assuming the updated record value
is correct.

TEST CASE 1:

Modifying VDD VRM1 VINI Record data
root@rainier:/tmp# dd if=/dev/zero of=/sys/devices/platform/ahb/ahb:apb/ahb:apb:bus
@1e78a000/1e78a580.i2c-bus/i2c-10/10-0050/10-00500/nvmem bs=1 count=3 seek=163
3+0 records in
3+0 records out

VINI ECC DATA at 0x2f2e BEFORE FIXING (VINI ECC SIZE = 0x24)
00002f20  d2 48 05 0f dd b5 f9 3d  5b 81 b3 79 cb 19 22 85  |.H.....=[..y..".|
00002f30  b2 77 34 9c 91 44 44 91  7b 44 a9 30 17 3b 07 33  |.w4..DD.{D.0.;.3|
00002f40  63 65 46 c2 06 3b 34 44  6a a7 83 60 b5 df 6d 08  |ceF..;4Dj..`..m.|
00002f50  2a 47

USING VPD-TOOL TO FIX ECC
root@rainier:/tmp# ./vpd-tool --eccFix --object /system/chassis/motherboard/vdd_vrm1 --record VINI
ECC updation successfull for the given record VINI ,present in the given object
/system/chassis/motherboard/vdd_vrm1.

VINI ECC DATA AFTER FIXING
00002f20  d2 48 05 0f dd b5 f9 3d  5b 81 b3 79 cb 19 4e c0  |.H.....=[..y..N.|
00002f30  bc 62 54 1c 90 46 44 91  7b 44 a9 30 17 3b 07 33  |.bT..FD.{D.0.;.3|
00002f40  63 65 46 c2 06 3b 34 44  6a a7 83 60 b5 df 6f 48  |ceF..;4Dj..`..oH|
00002f50  79 47

TEST CASE 2:

Modifying CPU3 VINI Record Data
root@rainier:/tmp# dd if=/dev/zero of=/sys/devices/platform/ahb/ahb:apb/1e79b000.fsi/fsi-
master/fsi0/slave@00:00/00:00:00:0a/fsi-master/fsi1/slave@03:00/01:03:00:04/spi_master/spi42
/spi42.0/spi42.00/nvmem bs=1 count=3 seek=197019
3+0 records in
3+0 records out

VINI ECC DATA AT 0xf190 BEFORE FIXINF THE ECC (VINI ECC SIZE = 0x29)
0003f190  35 63 1a 0e a1 88 c0 01  bb 31 b3 17 00 b2 02 05  |5c.......1......|
0003f1a0  88 90 93 1b 94 a4 02 20  56 40 22 7c 03 6d 38 10  |....... V@"|.m8.|
0003f1b0  d7 76 23 82 a6 36 90 1b  5a

USING VPD-TOOL TO FIX ECC
root@rainier:/tmp# ./vpd-tool --eccFix --object /system/chassis/motherboard/cpu3 --record VINI
 ECC updation successfull for the given record VINI ,present in the given object /system/chassis/motherboard/cpu3.

VINI ECC DATA AFTER FIXING

f190  31 63 98 0e 21 88 c2 01  9b 35 b3 17 00 b2 02 05  |1c..!....5......|
0003f1a0  88 90 93 1b 94 a4 02 20  56 40 22 7c 03 6d 38 10  |....... V@"|.m8.|
0003f1b0  d7 77 23 82 a2 36 b0 9b  58

TEST CASE 3:

Modifying CPU2 VINI Record Data
root@rainier:/tmp# dd if=/dev/zero of=/sys/devices/platform/ahb/ahb:apb/1e79b000.fsi/fsi-master/
fsi0/slave@00:00/00:00:00:0a/fsi-master/fsi1/slave@02:00/01:02:00:04/spi_master/spi32/spi32.0/
spi32.00/nvmem bs=1 count=3 seek=197019
3+0 records in
3+0 records out

VINI ECC DATA AT 0xf190 BEFORE FIXINF THE ECC (VINI ECC SIZE = 0x29)
0003f190  35 63 1a 0e a1 88 c0 01  bb 31 b3 17 00 b2 02 05  |5c.......1......|
0003f1a0  8c 90 93 1b 96 a4 42 20  56 40 22 7c 03 6d 38 10  |......B V@"|.m8.|
0003f1b0  d7 76 23 82 a6 36 90 1b  5a

USING VPD-TOOL TO FIX ECC
root@rainier:/tmp# ./vpd-tool --eccFix --object /system/chassis/motherboard/cpu2 --record VINI
 ECC updation successfull for the given record VINI ,present in the given object /system/chassis/motherboard/cpu2.

VINI ECC DATA AFTER FIXING
0003f190  31 63 98 0e 21 88 c2 01  9b 35 b3 17 00 b2 02 05  |1c..!....5......|
0003f1a0  8c 90 93 1b 96 a4 42 20  56 40 22 7c 03 6d 38 10  |......B V@"|.m8.|
0003f1b0  d7 77 23 82 a2 36 b0 9b  58

Signed-off-by: Priyanga Ramasamy <priyanga24@in.ibm.com>
Change-Id: I52b3bc70a9b2d85863b472a1d96e4f131ebdb94e
